alert.note: Alert for Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; South Central Mountains; Union County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Watch issued October 22 at 12:13PM MDT until October 23 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SUNDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory today, west to southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. For the High Wind Watch on Sunday, southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph possible. * WHERE...South Central Mountains, Harding County, Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass and Union County. * WHEN...From Sunday morning through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass; South Central Mountains; Union County
